Starting from the opening price, the analyst will fill in a box in the first column if the
closing price has changed by at least the box size. An X indicates an increase of one
box size and an O indicates a decrease. If the price changes by more than one box size,
the analyst will fill in multiple Xs or Os. If the price continues in the same direction in
the next periods, the analyst will continue filling in the same column. When the price
changes in the opposite direction by at least the reversal size, the analyst will begin the
next column (see panel b of Figure 3).
